name: Boating Simulator 2020: Bang Bang Gangsta
description: The 2nd installment in the Boating Simulator 20' Franchise, Be a pirate. In a Grand Theft Auto 1 style game, Go around robbing boats, Stealing boats, And sinking boats in San Aqua City, Though San Aqua isn't normal. San Aqua doesn't have roads, Though it does have water, It doesn't have cars, But it does have boats, It doesn't have sidewalks, But it does have bridges. San Aqua is a residence of crime given its location. You can't survive without a criminal record. The police force isn't a thing, Criminals police the city, They hold you for ransom and contact your family if they catch you without a criminal record. The streets--- I mean waters are very dangerous. Settling down isn't a thing. Evacuating and settling down is. Violence is rewarded, Pacifism is punished. Can you make it?
